revised_title: Investigation of Broadened Spectrum Lines and Their Causes
tldr: The authors investigate the causes of broadened spectrum lines, particularly in vacuum tubes with condensed discharges. They find that the main cause of broadening is the electric field of neighboring particles, rather than the movement of the luminous particle as a whole or the charge carried by the particles. The study also shows that the magnitude of the broadening decreases as the pressure decreases.
